class Solution:
    def maxSumPath(self, arr1, arr2, m, n):
        i = 0
        sum_i = 0
        j = 0
        sum_j = 0
        total_sum = 0
        while i < m and j < n:
            if arr1[i] < arr2[j]:
                sum_i += arr1[i]
                i += 1
            elif arr2[j] < arr1[i]:
                sum_j += arr2[j]
                j += 1
            else:
                total_sum += max(sum_i, sum_j) + arr1[i]
                sum_i = 0
                sum_j = 0
                i += 1
                j += 1
        if i == m:
            total_sum += max(sum(arr2[j:]) + sum_j, sum_i)
        else:
            total_sum += max(sum(arr1[i:]) + sum_i, sum_j)
        return total_sum
